page.title: 10Miserden Horse Show
page.content: {The Horse show and Country Fair}was held in aid of the School Fund. Saturday,July 13th was a beautiful, sunny day and hundreds of competitors entered for the various horse riding events. { The Country Fair included stalls {selling cakes,produce,toys, books and {clothing.Other attractions included a {raffle,tombola and some guessing {competitions.}There were pony rides and an exciting trip on a motor bike buggy. Children from the school were involved selling refreshments,raffle tickets,balloons and helping on the stalls.A coconut shy proved a popular event. Many more people than expected supported a successful day and over {one thousand pounds was raised.
